groupdesc: Configure theme parameters associated with Search Engine Optimization.

fields.name: seo_use_gk_seo_settings
fields.label: Use Gavern SEO Settings
fields.tooltip: Enable use of Gavern SEO settings instead of standard WordPress settings.

fields.name: seo_use_blogname_in_title
fields.label: Display blogname in title
fields.tooltip: Enable display of blogname in page title.

fields.name: seo_separator_in_title
fields.label: Specify page title separator
fields.tooltip: Specify separator to be used in page title.

fields.name: seo_description
fields.label: Set title description
fields.tooltip: Set the phrase to be used in the title as description.

fields.name: seo_blogname
fields.label: Set title blogname
fields.tooltip: Set the phrase to be used in the title as blogname.

fields.name: seo_homepage_desc
fields.label: Homepage description
fields.tooltip: Enable the page description metatag on the homepage.

fields.name: seo_homepage_desc_value
fields.label: Homepage description text
fields.tooltip: Specify the content of the homepage description metatag.

fields.name: seo_post_desc
fields.label: Blog post descriptions
fields.tooltip: Enable custom post descriptions (to be populated with content specified in the post editor custom field).

fields.name: seo_homepage_keywords
fields.label: Homepage keywords
fields.tooltip: Enable the page keywords metatag on the homepage.

fields.name: seo_homepage_keywords_value
fields.label: Homepage keywords text
fields.tooltip: Specify content for the homepage keywords metatag.

fields.name: seo_post_keywords
fields.label: Blog post keywords
fields.tooltip: Enable custom post keywords (to be populated with content specified in the post editor custom field).
